segments.text: Hi , Cole . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: if you have a few minutes , I'd like to talk to you about my future at this company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: let me just grab your file . How long have you worked for us now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've worked here as a sales representative for about a year now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: one year already ? It's amazing how time flies like that . Are you enjoying your job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , but I'd like to have a chance at job advancement .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . What job did you have in mind .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , I've noticed that is a position available as a sales manager .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: do you understand what duties that job would entail ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes . I would be directly responsible for all of the sales representatives in my department . I assume there'd be more meetings , paperwork , and other responsibilities , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's right . Do you have any experience in management ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes . In fact if you look at my resume , you can see that I was a manager before I started this job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: well , I think you'd be the perfect candidate for the position . According to company policy , you'll still have to go through the formal application procedures though , so fill this application form in
